name: A Short Adventure (Puxley)
description:
FFS Jam 2022

This is my submission for the FFS Jam 2022! Unfortunately, I was only able to spend roughly 2 weeks on this throughout January, so the game is missing some polish in a number of areas. However, I hope you all enjoy the game!

Game Description

Help the bunny reach the special door of The Great Fruit Tree! Only those who have found all of the gems may gain access!

Controls KeyboardControllerMoveWASDLeft StickLookMouseRight StickSprintLeft Shift (Hold)Right Trigger (Hold)
Left Trigger (Hold)JumpSpace BarA (Xbox)
X (PlayStation)InteractFX (Xbox)
Square (PlayStation)Main Menu
QuitEscapeView button (Xbox)
Share button (PlayStation) Credits

Design / Programming - Puxley
Character, Level, Tree & Bush assets - Quaternius
Rocks & Plant assets - Kay Lousberg
Moving Platform asset - Kenney
